definition[0]: to or in a foreign country that is across the sea
example[0]: Chris is going to work overseas.
definition[1]: coming from, existing in, or happening in a foreign country that is across the sea
definition[2]: to, in, or from a foreign country across the sea
example[4]: He spent quite a lot of time working overseas.
definition[3]: coming from, existing, or happening abroad
example[5]: exchange control requirements applying to overseas shareholders
example[6]: The law made it possible for overseas companies to hold a stake in Russian companies.
